title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips show the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN?? ?T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips should show in the given format.

Actual Result: Tips show in one line.
OB: When putting large content in a text item and hovering the mouse over it, the tips are displayed in a single line.
EB: The tips for a text item should be displayed in the given format instead of in a single line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a text item.
2. Enter a large content in the text item.
3. Save the changes.
4. Put the mouse on the text item to view the tips.
